universalmusicplayer.gui.vlcinstallcance: This will disable Universal Music Player Library (and its child mods).
universalmusicplayer.gui.config.title: Universal Music Player - Configuration
universalmusicplayer.gui.config.esc.not_: Your changes weren't saved because you pressed escape.
universalmusicplayer.gui.config.esc.tool: Press ESC to discard and exit.
universalmusicplayer.config.entry.defaul: If enabled, default minecraft music can be played.
universalmusicplayer.config.entry.toast_: If enabled, music volume lowers when a toast appears!
